sentences.en: A region of low pressure with roughly concentric isobars is known technically as a cyclone.
sentences.cn: 具有大致同心的等压线的低压区在技术上称为气旋.

sentences.en: Additional concentric prestressing was required in the pier.
sentences.cn: 墩内要求另加集中压力.

sentences.en: Body, disc, stem concentric design, 100 % bi - directional bubble grade seal.
sentences.cn: ◇阀体 、 阀板 、 阀轴同心结构设计, 100% 双向 气泡级密封.

sentences.en: Concentric nothingnesses swaddle my heart, a bell that never rings.
sentences.cn: 一层层同心的虚无是我心的襁褓, 裹着一口永不敲响的钟.

sentences.en: Drag to add up to 4 concentric circles with adjustable radii.
sentences.cn: 拖动此形状,可添加多达4个具有可调半径的同心圆.

sentences.en: It consists of a pair of concentric cylinder.
sentences.cn: 它由一对同轴的圆筒组成.

sentences.en: It Duocheng block, bell emulsion, hull shape and concentric strip.
sentences.cn: 它多呈块状 、 钟乳状 、 皮壳状及同心条带状.

sentences.en: On a blackboard, he drew five concentric circles.
sentences.cn: 他在黑板上画了5个同心圆。

sentences.en: Successive wave fronts in this case form a series of concentric spheres.
sentences.cn: 相继波前形成了一系列的同心球面.

sentences.en: The concentric orifice is most frequently used type.
sentences.cn: 同心圆孔板是最经常使用的形式.

sentences.en: The curvature of the film is concentric with the mirror behind the meniscus.
sentences.cn: 胶片的曲率是和弯月透镜后面的反射镜同心的.

sentences.en: The motion transformation is not necessary coplanar, nor must it be concentric.
sentences.cn: 运动的变换不是必须共面的, 也不必须是同心的.

sentences.en: The spherical surfaces defined by several arbitrarily chosen points are all concentric.
sentences.cn: 凡是由几个任意选点确定的球面都是同心面.

sentences.en: The street plan of the city has evolved as a series of concentric rings.
sentences.cn: 该城市的街道平面图像一圈圈的同心圆环.
